name: Sayonara Wild Rides
description:
A little remake of Sayonara Wild Hearts game that developed by Simogo for our University Final Project

Everybody made his own music and level, also I have implemented Sebastian Lague's asset to the game for roads.

Team:

  • Cenker Cennet
  • Can Yılar 
  • Mert Ünlü
